description: Pineapple is a mobile application that allows non-developers to create their own mobile apps. To create an app, Pineapple users drag, drop, and edit app elements in Pineapple's app editor.

In-progress Pineapple apps are saved in PINEAPPLE files. These files contain all the configuration data, assets, and other files that Pineapple needs to render a user's Pineapple project into a functional mobile application.
